mapper.select:
SELECT DINFO_DATE as 'date', DINFO_HIGH as 'high', DINFO_LOW as 'low', DINFO_LAST as 'last', DINFO_VOLUME as 'volume', DINFO_RESULT as 'result', DINFO_ERRCODE as 'errorCode', DINFO_ERRMSG as 'errorMsg' FROM TB_TESTBOT_DAILYINFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND DINFO_DATE = #{date}
AND DINFO_EXCHANGE = #{exchange}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_TESTBOT_DAILYINFO(DINFO_DATE, DINFO_EXCHANGE, DINFO_HIGH, DINFO_LOW, DINFO_LAST, DINFO_VOLUME, DINFO_RESULT, DINFO_ERRCODE, DINFO_ERRMSG) VALUES (#{date}, #{exchange}, #{high}, #{low}, #{last}, #{volume}, #{result}, #{errorCode}, #{errorMsg})
